insight: ChatControl's Discord integration requires the DiscordSRV plugin. Users must disable DiscordSRV's built-in chat relay by setting `DiscordChatChannelMinecraftToDiscord: false` in DiscordSRV's `config.yml`, otherwise messages get duplicated. ChatControl checks this on startup and logs a warning if it's still enabled (see ChatControl.java line ~247).

Channels support a `Party` config key to restrict messages to players in the same third-party plugin group. Available built-in values: `factions-faction`, `factions-ally`, `factions-enemy`, `factions-truce`, `towny-town`, `towny-nation`, `towny-ally`, `mcmmo-party`, `lands-land`, `parties-party`, `plotsquared-plot`, and `bentobox-island-{visitor,coop,trusted,member,subowner,owner,mod,admin}`. Custom parties can be registered via `Party.register()`.
